nodes.text: The Alien Arms Bazaar was a weapons market located in the Wannschok Tenements in the Nikto Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Nautolan Nurkolas operated his shop, Nurkolas Arms, out of the bazaar, as did the merchant Gamoruk.
The Alien Arms Bazaar appears as part of the Nikto Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
